bookableLocationId.title: bookableLocationId
bookableLocationId.description: The 18-character alphanumeric ID of the specific Bookable Location to filter availabilities. Omit this input entirely if no specific location is selected by the user. If provided, it must be a valid Salesforce ID starts with 'a0D'. If not provided, availabilities for all locations will be returned.

endDate.title: endDate
endDate.description: The end date for searching slots, in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-08-19'). Must be a future date and after or equal to fromDate; extend range if no slots found, but keep reasonable to avoid too many results.

orderItemIds.title: orderItemIds
orderItemIds.description: List of OrderItem IDs for which to fetch booking availabilities. Each string must begin with '802' and be a valid Salesforce Id.

startDate.title: startDate
startDate.description: The start date for searching slots, in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-07-19'). Must be a future date and before or equal to untilDate; if past or invalid, action may return emptyâ€”prompt user for future dates.
